name: Confined Stars
description:
Be a star defeating ships in space to reach and beat the boss, while confined to a small circular screen area.

This is a Shoot 'em Up and a Bullet Hell.

Be Advised -> This game contains Flashing UI, Camera Shake and High Contrast Projectiles.

If you liked the game, let me know! I'm planning to work on a full release and would appreciate any feedback.

DEFAULT CONTROLS :

  • Move -> WASD or Arrow Keys
  • Aim -> Mouse
  • Shooting -> Hold Left Mouse Button or Space
  • Special Atk -> Right Mouse Button
  • Pause -> P
